idea-plugin.name: Compose Resources Kit
idea-plugin.description:
Automatically regenerates Compose Multiplatform resource accessors when files in composeResources directories are modified.

Eliminates the need to manually run generateResourceAccessorsForCommonMain after editing strings.xml, drawables, or other resource files.

Supports custom resource directories configured via compose.resources { customDirectory(...) }.

The plugin only activates for projects using the org.jetbrains.compose Gradle plugin.
